title: 打鐘
flavourText: A prose-esque thing about the recess bell
description:
This is the only piece of text written in Chinese. It actually predates everything else on this site; but since it was only considered to be a part of the plasticity series retroactively, I wouldn't really entitle it as so.
This is a short prose-esque thing, written in my primary school years (P4, to be exact), concerning the recess bell.
